thread.title: The perfect boutique hotel in London!
thread.title_full: The perfect boutique hotel in London! - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: kthomason2017
title: The perfect boutique hotel in London!
text:
My mother, daughter and I stayed in your beautiful and perfectly appointed hotel for the past week and absolutely loved our stay in adjoining rooms. We cannot say enough about the staff at the hotel, they were amazing and answered my mountain of questions in advance of our stay quickly, even arranging a private tour of Hamley's, which was perfect for our 11-year old. From reservations, to reception to the dining areas, we have nothing but compliments and highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for a smaller boutique hotel. We felt completely at home and safe here, walking to Paddington in minutes, Marble Arch in about 15 minutes and even a delicious pub was only minutes away as well. Truly cannot give this hotel and it's staff enough compliments, they were incredible!
Room Tip: Would recommend higher floors, with neighborhood view, very quiet, except for a few squeaky floors... See more room tips
